title.en: English for Advanced Learners II (100% Web-Based), Level C1
title.et: Inglise keel kõrgtasemele II (100% e-õpe), tase C1

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en:
The participants are expected to be at CEF B2 level. After the course opens, the student has to take a placement test on the course's Moodle page.

During the course students read/listen to different texts (essays, short stories, media, sketches, interviews, etc) and do grammar/vocabulary exercises. Students need to submit a vocabulary notebook and sit a final grammar test at the end of the course.

Course requirements:
1. Uploading weekly worksheets
2. Sitting weekly grammar quizzes
3. Submitting a vocabulary notebook
4. Sitting the final grammar test
description.et:
Kursusest osavõtjatelt eeldatakse CEF B2 (upper-intermediate) keeleoskustaset. Pärast kursuse avanemist tuleb teha tasemetest kursuse Moodle lehel.

Kursuse jooksul loetakse/kuulatakse/analüüsitakse erinevaid tekste (esseed, lühijutud, ajakirjanduslikud tekstid, sketšid, intervjuud) ja tehakse grammatika- ja sõnavaraülesandeid. Kursuse lõpus tuleb esitada sõnavara-päevik ja teha lühike gramatikatest semestri jooksul läbitud grammatika peale. 

Läbimise tingimused:
1. Iganädalaste töölehtede üleslaadimine
2. Iganädalaste grammatikatestide läbimine positiivsele tulemusele
3. Sõnavara-päeviku esitamine
4. Grammatika lõputesti tegemine

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to develop general vocabulary reading/listening different texts (essays, novels, media) and consolidate some advanced language structures.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on laiendada üldkeele sõnavara inglise keeles C1 tasemel erineva suunitlusega tekstide (esseistika/novellistika ning ajakirjandus) lugemise ning kuulamise kaudu ning konsolideerida mõningaid kõrgema taseme keelestruktuure.

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of the course the students
1. will have practiced different vocabulary learning strategies;
learning_outcomes.et: 1. on harjutanud erinevaid sõnavara õppimise strateegiaid;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. know how to use some advanced language structures more successfully;
3. are able to analyse academic oral/written texts on the language and text level;
learning_outcomes.et: 3. oskab sõnavara ja teksti tasmemel analüüsida ingliskeelse akadeemilise suunitlusega suulist/kirjalikku teksti;

notes.et:
- By registering for this course you agree with the course requirements and policies.
- This is not a grammar or writing or exam preparation course.
- This course is non-graded (pass/fail). 
- You need to complete all course components with a positive result to pass the course.
- You need to collect 71 points to pass the course. 
- Please note the deadline for dropping the course. If you want to drop the course after the deadline, you need to contact the study coordinator (marilii.paalo (at) ut.ee).
- In case of plagiarism or any other kind of academic dishonesty (copying text/sentences and presenting it as one's own, not using paraphrasing, not crediting the sources, cheating during the test) the you will be removed from the course immediately and your result for the course will be "fail".
- According to the decision of the Department of English Studies, large language models must not be used during the course.
- In case of any problems, contact me right away to find a solution.

DEADLINES
• May 18, 23.59 is the deadline for the grammar quizzes. Grammar quizzes will not open after May 18.
• May 18, 23.59 is also the deadline for the course work (weekly worksheets, film task, vocabulary notebook) to get feedback. Course work submitted after May 18 won’t get feedback.
• June 13, 16.00 is the final deadline for course work (weekly worksheets, essay).
• June 15, 23.59 is the final deadline for the final grammar test and the vocabulary notebook.
• After June 13/15 no deadline extensions will be granted as the results need to be put in the SIS.

independent_work.et:
5 weekly worksheets
6 grammar quizzes
Film task
Vocabulary notebook

description.et:
5 weekly worksheets, 7 pts each
6 progression quizzes, 5 pts each
Film task 5 pts
Vocabulary notebook 20 pts

grade_preconditions.et: Weekly worksheets, grammar quizzes, film task, vocabulary notebook and final grammar test(passed)

grade_evaluation.et: If you have fulfilled all the course requirements by May 25, 2025, you will get your results automatically.

arvestatud.et: You will pass the course when you sit the final grammar test, upload the vocabulary notebook and gather 71 points during the course.

mittearvestatud.et: Final grammar test and/or the vocabulary notebook have not been submitted and/or you have gathered less than 71 points.

mitteilmunud.et: No course assignment has been submitted.

debt_elimination.et: All study debts need to be settled by 13/15 June 2025.

resources.mandatory_materials: Handouts will be uploaded to Moodle.
resources.recommended_materials: Links to materials are on Moodle.
